subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] Re: Letter connections and syllable boundaries (or, the spelling of "kangaroo")
msgSnippet: ... Lexical set names are in ALL CAPS.  See the list at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lexical_sets . -- There is no real going back.  Though I          John
messageBody:
Terry Smithwick scripsit:
> I would like to see some sort of consistent list of
> QS letter names, Lexical Set names, etc. that have
> been tossed around lately.

Lexical set names are in ALL CAPS. See the list
at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lexical_sets .

--
There is no real going back. Though I John Cowan
may come to the Shire, it will not seem cowan@...
the same; for I shall not be the same. http://www.ccil.org/~cowan
I am wounded with knife, sting, and tooth,
and a long burden. Where shall I find rest? --Frodo
